user.title: SFML Stats - Welcome
user.description:
Welcome to SFML Stats!

This integration tracks your solar production, battery, grid usage and calculates costs.

Click NEXT to configure your sensors.

sensors.title: Sensor Configuration
sensors.description:
Configure all sensor mappings. Leave empty if not available.

**Required units:**
- Power: Watt (W)
- Energy: kWh (with daily reset)
- SOC: Percent (0-100)
- Price: ct/kWh

data_description.sensor_solar_power: Total PV power in Watt (W). Current value from inverter.
data_description.sensor_solar_to_house: Solar direct consumption in Watt (W). Power flowing directly to house.
data_description.sensor_solar_to_battery: Solar battery charging in Watt (W). Power charging the battery.
data_description.sensor_solar_yield_daily: Daily yield in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_grid_to_house: Grid import house in Watt (W). Power drawn from grid.
data_description.sensor_grid_to_battery: Grid import battery in Watt (W). Grid power for battery charging.
data_description.sensor_house_to_grid: Grid export in Watt (W). Surplus power fed to grid.
data_description.sensor_grid_import_daily: Daily grid import in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_grid_import_yearly: Yearly grid import in kWh. Total import this calendar year.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_import: Smartmeter import in Watt (W). Current import from meter.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_export: Smartmeter export in Watt (W). Current export at meter.
data_description.sensor_battery_soc: State of charge in percent (0-100%). Battery SOC.
data_description.sensor_battery_power: Battery power in Watt (W). Positive=charging, Negative=discharging.
data_description.sensor_battery_to_house: Battery discharge in Watt (W). Power going to house.
data_description.sensor_battery_to_grid: Battery export in Watt (W). Power going to grid.
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_solar_daily: Solar charging today in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_grid_daily: Grid charging today in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_home_consumption: Total home consumption in Watt (W). All consumers combined.
data_description.sensor_price_total: Current electricity price in ct/kWh. From Tibber, Octopus, etc.

helpers.title: Missing kWh Sensors
helpers.description:
**{missing_count}** daily kWh sensor(s) missing:

**{missing_sensors}**

These can be created from your Watt sensors.

**How to:**
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services → Helpers
2. Create a "Riemann sum integral" sensor (W → kWh)
3. Create a "Utility meter" with daily reset

Or add the following to configuration.yaml:

```yaml
{yaml_config}
```

consumers.title: Consumer Sensors (Optional)
consumers.description:
Configure sensors for additional consumers.

These are OPTIONAL - only configure if you have these devices.

**Required units:**
- Power: Watt (W)
- Energy: kWh (with daily reset)
- COP: Decimal number (e.g. 3.5)
- State: Text (charging/idle)

data_description.sensor_heatpump_power: Current HP power in Watt (W). Live consumption of heat pump.
data_description.sensor_heatpump_daily: HP daily consumption in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_heatpump_cop: COP sensor as decimal (e.g. 3.5). Fallback: 3.5 if empty.
data_description.sensor_heatingrod_power: Current heating rod power in Watt (W). Live consumption.
data_description.sensor_heatingrod_daily: Heating rod daily in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_wallbox_power: Current charging power in Watt (W). Live power of wallbox.
data_description.sensor_wallbox_daily: Wallbox daily consumption in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_wallbox_state: State sensor with text: 'charging' = active, 'idle' = ready.

data_description.generate_weekly: Create a weekly report every Sunday
data_description.generate_monthly: Create a monthly report on the 1st of each month

forecast_comparison.title: Forecast Comparison
forecast_comparison.description:
Configure up to 2 external forecast entities for the 7-day comparison chart.

**Required unit:** kWh (daily forecast)

data_description.forecast_entity_1: Sensor with daily forecast in kWh (e.g. sensor.solcast_forecast_today).
data_description.forecast_entity_2: Sensor with daily forecast in kWh (e.g. sensor.forecast_solar_energy_today).
